H0.text: The mask worn in the 1996 film ‘Scream’ is based on a painting by which artist. Francis Bacon

H1.text: The mask worn in the 1996 film ‘Scream’ is based on a painting by which artist. Salvador Dali

H2.text: The mask worn in the 1996 film ‘Scream’ is based on a painting by which artist. H.R. Giger

H3.text: The mask worn in the 1996 film ‘Scream’ is based on a painting by which artist. Edvard munch

A4.text: the Ghostface mask worn by the primary antagonists of the Scream series of horror was not inspired by the Munch painting
